casebody.data:
PETER HALL, Administrator d. b. n. of David Hall, v. DAVID WALKER, Administrator d. b. n. of DAVID HALL, the younger, and FREDERICK ROW and ELIZABETH, his Wife, Administratrix of Joseph Hall. Court of Chancery. Sussex. March 11, 1823. Ridgely’s Notebook IV, 162.

[For this case, see 1 Del.Ch. 241.]
